Question.Subject: Is there a site where you can find somone to just talk to?
Question.Content: Preferably of the opposite sex and we can just talk? lol.. I know it sounds sad, but i dont care haha
Question.ChosenAnswer: I'd say Chat Roulette. I have some friends who've had fairly long conversations with people from all over the world. Supposedly, there's some perverts on this site - you can skip them til you find someone you wanna talk to- but the majority of its users are just wanting to talk to somebody.
